section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion to announce in No. 73-1424, Serfass against the United States.
And for reasons stated in an opinion filed today with the clerk, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Douglas has filed a dissenting statement.
